Trade/Device Name(s): NuvoMed Wireless Blood Glucose Monitoring System (Model BGM-6/0352)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): NuvoMed Wireless Blood Glucose Monitor (Model BGM-6/0352)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for NuvoMed Wireless Blood Glucose Monitoring System (Model BGM-6/0352) featuring Bluetooth data transmission and intended for self-monitoring of blood glucose by people with diabetes
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip or forearm by a single person for self-testing at home as an aid in monitoring effectiveness of a diabetes control program; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
